MESSAGE.JP: た野球部の部室を訪れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I was in the baseball club room again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was in the baseball club room again.

MESSAGE.JP: ットを探すためだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The purpose for my visit this time was to find a bat.
MESSAGE.Translation: The purpose for my visit this time was to find a bat.

MESSAGE.JP: れは簡単に見つかった。
MESSAGE.EN: And the objective was effortlessly completed.
MESSAGE.Translation: And the objective was effortlessly completed.

MESSAGE.JP: 声@「それでどうするつもりだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝What are you going to do with that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝What are you going to do with that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: が背後からしてびっくりする。
MESSAGE.EN: The voice from behind took me by surprise.
MESSAGE.Translation: The voice from behind took me by surprise.

MESSAGE.JP: 事を非難するかのような声だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was the voice of someone condemning a miscreant.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was the voice of someone condemning a miscreant.

MESSAGE.JP: かにこっそりバットを拝借しようとしているわけだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, it was a fact that I was borrowing a bat without permission...
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, it was a fact that I was borrowing a bat without permission...

MESSAGE.JP: えながら振り返ると…。
MESSAGE.EN: I timidly turned around...
MESSAGE.Translation: I timidly turned around...

MESSAGE.JP: 生かと思ったその声の主は、謙吾だった。
MESSAGE.EN: I expected there would be a teacher, but the owner of the voice was Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: I expected there would be a teacher, but the owner of the voice was Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや、４人いるんだしさ、キャッチボールじゃなくて、２対２にして試合っぽくしたほうが楽しいかなって思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well you know, now that there are four of us, I think it would be more fun if we form two teams and play a match.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well you know, now that there are four of us, I think it would be more fun if we form two teams and play a match.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 由を話す。
MESSAGE.EN: I explained my reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: I explained my reason.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえは何をしようとしているんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What are you going to do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What are you going to do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だから、野球…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Like I said, baseball...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Like I said, baseball...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「なんのために」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝For what reason?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝For what reason?❞

MESSAGE.JP: うしてここまで執拗に問いつめられているのだろう…謙吾の考えていることがさっぱりわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know why he was being so persistent... I just couldn't read him at all.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know why he was being so persistent... I just couldn't read him at all.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「みんなで野球したら楽しいでしょ？　そんなことに理由なんている？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't you think it would be fun to play baseball together? What more is there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't you think it would be fun to play baseball together? What more is there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「楽しいからか。だったら他の遊びでもいいじゃないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Because it'd be fun, huh? Then can't we do whatever else that looks fun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Because it'd be fun, huh? Then can't we do whatever else that looks fun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも鈴が野球をやりたがってるんだよ。他の遊びになんてまったく興味を示さなかったあの日からの鈴が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But Rin wants to do this. You know she hasn't been interested in anything before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But Rin wants to do this. You know she hasn't been interested in anything before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そうだな…今のおまえの目的はよくわかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝That's right... I understand your purpose very well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝That's right... I understand your purpose very well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「なら、俺はここで降りる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝So I'm out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝So I'm out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おりる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Out?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Out?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「後は三人でやってくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝The rest is between you three.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝The rest is between you three.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「え？　ちょっと待ってよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Wait a second!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Wait a second!❞

MESSAGE.JP: うやくその意味を理解し、僕は焦る。
MESSAGE.EN: As what he meant sunk in at last, I lost my composure.
MESSAGE.Translation: As what he meant sunk in at last, I lost my composure.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「やっと４人揃ったのにっ、これからだと思ってたのに…わけがわからないよ、どうして!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The four of us are finally back together, and I thought... I, I just don't get you. Why!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The four of us are finally back together, and I thought... I, I just don't get you. Why!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえには理解できない問題だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You wouldn't be able to understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You wouldn't be able to understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「怪我してから、率先して遊んできたのに、どうして今更降りるなんて言い出すのさ？　鈴のことが嫌いなの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You've been so eager to play ever since you got injured. Why would you leave us now? Do you hate Rin!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You've been so eager to play ever since you got injured. Why would you leave us now? Do you hate Rin!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「そんなわけないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No way.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No way.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「じゃあ、理由を教えてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then tell me why.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then tell me why.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「だから、言ったとしてもおまえには理解できない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I told you, even if I were to explain, you wouldn't be able to understand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I told you, even if I were to explain, you wouldn't be able to understand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いいから教えてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just tell me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just tell me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾は…顔の半分を手で覆って、苦しげに答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo... covered half of his face with his hand and answered in anguish.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo... covered half of his face with his hand and answered in anguish.

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「おまえの行動がかぶるんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You're doing exactly the same thing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You're doing exactly the same thing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何が？　誰と？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Same thing? With who?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Same thing? With who?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 謙吾@「今のおまえの行動が…あいつと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You're doing exactly the same thing... as he did.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You're doing exactly the same thing... as he did.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あいつ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who are you talking about?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who are you talking about?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 吾は答えない。
MESSAGE.EN: He wouldn't answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: He wouldn't answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…恭介？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Kyousuke?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Kyousuke?❞

MESSAGE.JP: うしてか、そうだと思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know why, but that was the one name that came to mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know why, but that was the one name that came to mind.

MESSAGE.JP: たっていたのだろう。何も言わなかったが、否定もしなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I must have been correct; Kengo didn't say anything, but didn't deny my words either.
MESSAGE.Translation: I must have been correct; Kengo didn't say anything, but didn't deny my words either.

MESSAGE.JP: ばらくの沈黙の後、背中を向け、その場を立ち去った。
MESSAGE.EN: After a moment of silence, he turned on his heels and left.
MESSAGE.Translation: After a moment of silence, he turned on his heels and left.

MESSAGE.JP: は見送るしかできなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: All I could do was watch him go.
MESSAGE.Translation: All I could do was watch him go.

MESSAGE.JP: だ、ひたすら考えていた。
MESSAGE.EN: But I was thinking hard.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I was thinking hard.

MESSAGE.JP: 体恭介は何をしたんだ？
MESSAGE.EN: What on earth was it that Kyousuke had done?
MESSAGE.Translation: What on earth was it that Kyousuke had done?

MESSAGE.JP: 、僕はバットを持っている。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm holding a bat in my hand,
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm holding a bat in my hand,

MESSAGE.JP: 球をしようとしている。
MESSAGE.EN: attempting to play baseball.
MESSAGE.Translation: attempting to play baseball.

MESSAGE.JP: 介もかつてそうしたというのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Was there a time when Kyousuke did this as well?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was there a time when Kyousuke did this as well?

MESSAGE.JP: んな話を、ずっと一緒にいた僕が知らないなんてあるのだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: How could I not know about it when I had been with him all this time...?
MESSAGE.Translation: How could I not know about it when I had been with him all this time...?

MESSAGE.JP: 会った時より昔にあった出来事なら、知らなくて当然だけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Of course, it was no wonder if it had happened before we met...
MESSAGE.Translation: Of course, it was no wonder if it had happened before we met...

MESSAGE.JP: も、その『件』は、今の鈴の状態や、恭介の立場に深く関係があるんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: But that matter might be deep at the core of the current state of the Natsume siblings.
MESSAGE.Translation: But that matter might be deep at the core of the current state of the Natsume siblings.

MESSAGE.JP: うしてもそう思えてならない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't help thinking that way.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't help thinking that way.

MESSAGE.JP: ったら、そう遠い話ではないはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: And if that was the case, I didn't think it could've occurred so long ago that I didn't know about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: And if that was the case, I didn't think it could've occurred so long ago that I didn't know about it.

MESSAGE.JP: た僕は空を見上げる。立体的な空を。
MESSAGE.EN: Again, I looked up at the clouds drifting across the sky.
MESSAGE.Translation: Again, I looked up at the clouds drifting across the sky.

MESSAGE.JP: 日、廊下から見た空とそっくりだった。
MESSAGE.EN: They looked pretty much the same as the ones I had watched from the hallway yesterday.
MESSAGE.Translation: They looked pretty much the same as the ones I had watched from the hallway yesterday.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「なんだ、打つのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's this, we gonna be batting?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's this, we gonna be batting?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ットを持って現れた僕を見て真人が訊く。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato asked when I showed up with the bat.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato asked when I showed up with the bat.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…うん。そうしたほうが楽しいと思って」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yes. I think that would be more fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yes. I think that would be more fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「そうだな。キャッチボールだけより、投げて打ったほうが楽しいだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Agreed. That would be more fun than just playing catch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Agreed. That would be more fun than just playing catch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「本当は２対２で試合形式にしたかったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I really wanted to make two teams...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I really wanted to make two teams...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「まあ、できるんじゃねぇか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, I guess we can do that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, I guess we can do that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もうできない。謙吾が降りたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Not anymore. Kengo left us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Not anymore. Kengo left us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「降りた？　あいつこねぇのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Seriously? He won't join us anymore?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Seriously? He won't join us anymore?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん、こない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, he won't.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, he won't.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「あの怪我してからおかしくなった謙吾がか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Even though he's been nuts ever since he got his injury?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Even though he's been nuts ever since he got his injury?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「頭でもぶつけて、正常に戻っちまったかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Maybe he got hit on the head and went back to normal...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Maybe he got hit on the head and went back to normal...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「さあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who knows...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who knows...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「まあ、三人でもできらぁ。気を落とすな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, I guess we can still do it even with the three of us. Don't be so down.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, I guess we can still do it even with the three of us. Don't be so down.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「ねぇ、真人」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Masato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Masato.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「みんな、何を隠してるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What are you guys hiding from me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What are you guys hiding from me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「ん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「隠し事ってんなら、そりゃ知られちゃ困るもんだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝If you want to hide something from other people, wouldn't it be a problem if you told them?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝If you want to hide something from other people, wouldn't it be a problem if you told them?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 談なのか、はぐらかそうとしているのか。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't tell whether Masato was making a joke or dodging the question.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't tell whether Masato was making a joke or dodging the question.

MESSAGE.JP: 人は知っているのか、知らないのか。
MESSAGE.EN: Whether he knew or not.
MESSAGE.Translation: Whether he knew or not.

MESSAGE.JP: の読みでは…知っていると思う。
MESSAGE.EN: My instincts told me... that he did.
MESSAGE.Translation: My instincts told me... that he did.

MESSAGE.JP: らないのは、僕と鈴だけだ、きっと。
MESSAGE.EN: It was likely just me and Rin who didn't know anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was likely just me and Rin who didn't know anything.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「教えてよ、僕の知らないところで一体何があったのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Tell me. What's behind all of this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Tell me. What's behind all of this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人は何も言わない。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato didn't say anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato didn't say anything.

MESSAGE.JP: も僕は責め立てるように続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet I pressed on as if interrogating him.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet I pressed on as if interrogating him.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「野球だよ、野球に関することだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Baseball. I'm pretty sure it has something to do with baseball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Baseball. I'm pretty sure it has something to do with baseball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「このバットを持ち出したら謙吾の態度が一変した」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kengo made an about-face when he saw me with this bat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kengo made an about-face when he saw me with this bat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No...❞

MESSAGE.JP: い出せ。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to recall more.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to recall more.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「だってそもそも、キャッチボールは離れてするもんだ。これだったら、みんなで遊べるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝To begin with, you don't have to get close to her when playing catch, so we can all play together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝To begin with, you don't have to get close to her when playing catch, so we can all play together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「何か問題あるかな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Is there some problem...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Is there some problem...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そもそも謙吾はキャッチボールの時点で乗り気じゃなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝From the first, he showed little interest when I invited him to play catch.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝From the first, he showed little interest when I invited him to play catch.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「あれだけ遊ぶことに積極的になっていたのに、へんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why would that be when he was so eager to play? That's weird.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why would that be when he was so eager to play? That's weird.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「おかしいでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You think so as well, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You think so as well, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: んな簡単な質問にも真人は黙ったままだ。
MESSAGE.EN: He wouldn't even answer that simple question of mine.
MESSAGE.Translation: He wouldn't even answer that simple question of mine.

MESSAGE.JP: は続ける。
MESSAGE.EN: Still I went on.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still I went on.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…謙吾はこの僕の行動が、恭介とかぶって見えると言ったんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...He said I'm doing exactly the same thing as Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...He said I'm doing exactly the same thing as Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「恭介も、いつかはわからないけど、野球を始めようとしたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't know when, but Kyousuke also tried to start playing baseball with her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't know when, but Kyousuke also tried to start playing baseball with her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「その先によくないことが起きた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And something bad happened afterward.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And something bad happened afterward.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「結果、鈴は人を恐がるようになって、恭介は僕らから離れていった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's the reason Rin's now afraid of other people and Kyousuke abandoned us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's the reason Rin's now afraid of other people and Kyousuke abandoned us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「そうして今に至っているんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's what brought us to this current situation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's what brought us to this current situation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...True.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...True.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 定を得た…。
MESSAGE.EN: I received an affirmative reply...
MESSAGE.Translation: I received an affirmative reply...

MESSAGE.JP: いに真人が口を割った。
MESSAGE.EN: He opened his mouth at last.
MESSAGE.Translation: He opened his mouth at last.

MESSAGE.JP: は続いて真人が何を話してくれるのか、それを待った。
MESSAGE.EN: I awaited his next words.
MESSAGE.Translation: I awaited his next words.

MESSAGE.JP: も、それは期待していたものとはほど遠いものだった。
MESSAGE.EN: But those words were far from what I had wanted to hear.
MESSAGE.Translation: But those words were far from what I had wanted to hear.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…そこまで来たんなら十分だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...I guess you've come close enough.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...I guess you've come close enough.❞

MESSAGE.JP: が？
MESSAGE.EN: What's that mean?
MESSAGE.Translation: What's that mean?

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「…あとはオレだけか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...And looks like I'm the only one left.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...And looks like I'm the only one left.❞

MESSAGE.JP: から何が？
MESSAGE.EN: What the heck does he mean?
MESSAGE.Translation: What the heck does he mean?

MESSAGE.JP: 人は左手にはめていたグローブを外して…地面に置いた。
MESSAGE.EN: He took his glove off, and... placed it down on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: He took his glove off, and... placed it down on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人@「オレも降りるぜ。後は任せた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm out, too. The rest is in your hands.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm out, too. The rest is in your hands.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 舎に向いて、歩いていく…。
MESSAGE.EN: He turned his back on us and started walking toward the school building.
MESSAGE.Translation: He turned his back on us and started walking toward the school building.

MESSAGE.JP: っていく…。
MESSAGE.EN: He was leaving...
MESSAGE.Translation: He was leaving...

MESSAGE.JP: 人までも…。
MESSAGE.EN: Even him...
MESSAGE.Translation: Even him...

MESSAGE.JP: うして…？
MESSAGE.EN: Why...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Why...?

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「待ってよ…真人…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wait... Masato...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wait... Masato...❞

MESSAGE.JP: は枯れていた。
MESSAGE.EN: My voice cracked.
MESSAGE.Translation: My voice cracked.

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「真人っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato!❞

MESSAGE.JP: 人は背中を向けたまま、手を振るだけだった。
MESSAGE.EN: With his broad back to me, he only waved his hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: With his broad back to me, he only waved his hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 人は愛すべき馬鹿な…僕の親友だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato was my lovable, stupid... best friend...
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato was my lovable, stupid... best friend...

MESSAGE.JP: のに…どうして…。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite that... why...
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite that... why...

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「どうしたんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's going on?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's going on?❞

MESSAGE.JP: りんと音がして鈴の顔が眼前に現れ、驚く。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin caught me by surprise when she showed up in front of me with a cling of her bell.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin caught me by surprise when she showed up in front of me with a cling of her bell.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「しないのか、キャッチボール」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Aren't we playing catch?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Aren't we playing catch?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「…するよ…もちろん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Yes, we are... of course.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Yes, we are... of course.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「でも…真人が…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But... Masato, he...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But... Masato, he...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「もうかえったのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Did he already go back?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Did he already go back?❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「いや…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「もうこないって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝He said he wouldn't play with us anymore...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝He said he wouldn't play with us anymore...❞

MESSAGE.JP: の前で弱さを見せてはいけない。僕は涙を堪えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't show her any of the weakness I felt inside; I fought back the tears.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't show her any of the weakness I felt inside; I fought back the tears.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴@「それは…なんだかさみしいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That's... kinda too bad.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That's... kinda too bad.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 理樹@「うん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

MESSAGE.JP: しい。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt lonely.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt lonely.

MESSAGE.JP: た元に戻ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: We were back to just the two of us again.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were back to just the two of us again.

MESSAGE.JP: とふたりきりになってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was just me and Rin yet again.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was just me and Rin yet again.

MESSAGE.JP: れでも、始めよう。
MESSAGE.EN: Even so, I had to begin.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even so, I had to begin.

MESSAGE.JP: たりきりのキャッチボールを。
MESSAGE.EN: I had to start my game of catch with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had to start my game of catch with her.

MESSAGE.JP: つものように自室まで運んで、晩ご飯を食べる。
MESSAGE.EN: As usual, I brought our meals and we had them in my dorm room.
MESSAGE.Translation: As usual, I brought our meals and we had them in my dorm room.

MESSAGE.JP: 日は一緒に居た謙吾も真人も来てくれなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Unlike the previous day, neither Kengo nor Masato was there with us.
MESSAGE.Translation: Unlike the previous day, neither Kengo nor Masato was there with us.

MESSAGE.JP: りる、というのは野球からだけでなく、一緒に遊ぶことや、食べることさえからも『降りる』という意味だったことを知る。
MESSAGE.EN: That made me realize that they had meant they were not only ❛out❜ of doing baseball, but playing or eating together as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: That made me realize that they had meant they were not only ❛out❜ of doing baseball, but playing or eating together as well.

MESSAGE.JP: まりそれは、友達の輪から外れる、ということだ。
MESSAGE.EN: In other words, they were out of our friendship.
MESSAGE.Translation: In other words, they were out of our friendship.

MESSAGE.JP: が帰った後、僕はこれまでそうしてきたように、真人に、そのことを知らせるメールを打った。
MESSAGE.EN: After Rin left, I texted Masato to inform him of that like any other day.
MESSAGE.Translation: After Rin left, I texted Masato to inform him of that like any other day.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐ返事が戻ってきた。
MESSAGE.EN: A reply arrived quickly.
MESSAGE.Translation: A reply arrived quickly.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日は帰らない』
MESSAGE.EN: [I'm not coming back today.]
MESSAGE.Translation: [I'm not coming back today.]

MESSAGE.JP: しは予想していたから、ショックは受けなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Since I had kind of anticipated this, it didn't shock me as much as it might have.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since I had kind of anticipated this, it didn't shock me as much as it might have.

MESSAGE.JP: の晩は、ひとりで寝る夜となった。
MESSAGE.EN: That night, I had to sleep alone in the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: That night, I had to sleep alone in the room.

MESSAGE.JP: つ以来だろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: When was the last time...?
MESSAGE.Translation: When was the last time...?

MESSAGE.JP: つも、誰かと一緒に寝ていた気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think there had always been somebody close by my side when I slept...
MESSAGE.Translation: I think there had always been somebody close by my side when I slept...

MESSAGE.JP: はルームメイトの真人とだけど…
MESSAGE.EN: Ever since we started living in this dorm, it had been Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ever since we started living in this dorm, it had been Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: さい頃はよく恭介がそばにいてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: But before that, it had been Kyousuke keeping me company.
MESSAGE.Translation: But before that, it had been Kyousuke keeping me company.

MESSAGE.JP: たりきりになると、いろんな話を聞かせてくれた。
MESSAGE.EN: When the two of us were alone, he had told me many kinds of stories.
MESSAGE.Translation: When the two of us were alone, he had told me many kinds of stories.

MESSAGE.JP: 振り返るとそれは、夢のような時間だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking back at those days now, they felt like a faraway dream.
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking back at those days now, they felt like a faraway dream.
